Major_Arcs.title: The Human Meteor's First Case
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc introduces Duke O'Dowd as the Human Meteor and his initial investigation into a suspicious yacht and an undersea threat.

sub_scenes.title: Introduction and Taxi Ride
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene introduces the Human Meteor and Duke O'Dowd, setting the stage with a taxi ride to the waterfront and initial suspicion.

sub_scenes.title: Waterfront Confrontation and Hospital Visit
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene shows Human Meteor taking action against criminals, followed by a hospital visit where a new mission is revealed.

sub_scenes.title: Yacht Infiltration and Underwater Investigation
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene details the plan to infiltrate the yacht, the infiltration itself, and the subsequent underwater investigation leading to a confrontation.

narrative_arcs.title: Duke's Rescue and Yacht's True Mission
Confrontation with New Diver and Tentacle Attack
Duke Targets the Ship and Needs Air

sub_scenes.title: Resolution and Aftermath
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene wraps up the Human Meteor's arc with evidence collection, debriefing, and a return to normalcy.

narrative_arcs.title: Discovery on the Yacht and Map Revelation

Major_Arcs.title: The Liberty Lads and the Nazi Spy Ring
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc follows Skip and Chuck, the Liberty Lads, as they stumble upon and help to dismantle a Nazi spy ring operating from a bus garage.

sub_scenes.title: Street Play and Accidental Discovery
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene introduces Skip and Chuck and their accidental involvement through an ambulance and a dropped wallet.

narrative_arcs.title: Ambulance Interne Drops Wallet and Boys Investigate
Marine Salutes Civilian and Boys Inquire

sub_scenes.title: Bus Garage Confrontation and Danger
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene details the boys' arrival at the bus garage and their escalating encounter with Mr. Horst and his men, leading to a dangerous situation.

narrative_arcs.title: Boys Arrive at Bus Garage and Encounter Uniformed Man
Boys Led to Mr. Horst and Instructed to Wait
Sudden Grab and Confrontation with Mr. Horst
Horst Questions Boys About Wallet Contents
Accusation of Lying in Another Room
Fight Breaks Out and Order to Stop
Man with Glasses Threatens Boys with Gun

sub_scenes.title: Rescue and Resolution
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene concludes the Liberty Lads' arc with their escape, seeking help, uncovering the spy ring, and the arrival of the Marines to resolve the conflict.

narrative_arcs.title: Skip Discovers Sabotage Plans and Confrontation
Skip's Book Defense and Gun Confrontation

Major_Arcs.title: The Twinkle Twins and the Case of the Murdered Banker
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc introduces the Twinkle Twins, Diane and Dan Weston, and their investigation into the murder of banker Robert Burgess, uncovering a racketeering plot.

sub_scenes.title: Introduction and Newspaper Briefing
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene introduces the Twinkle Twins and sets up their new case: the murder of Robert Burgess.

narrative_arcs.title: Introduction of The Champ and Henry
Interrogation and Revelation of Rosita's Kidnapping
Planning the Infiltration of El Tigre's Hideout
El Tigre's Weariness and Cryptic Thought
Searching for Rosita and Threatening El Tigre
Interrogation about Rosita and Denial of Kidnapping
Demand for Explanation Regarding Tigre's Actions
Urgent Call to Action and Pursuit
Determined Resolve to Rescue Rosita at Any Cost
Discovery of Rosita and Immediate Hostility
Machine Gun Threat and Heroic Intervention
Government Troops and Search for Fascists
Dolan Admits and Acts to Burn Supplies
Dolan's Surprise Attack and Fight with Natives
Natives' Homage and Gratitude to Marine
Shore Leave Rescinded and Dolan's Praise

sub_scenes.title: Twinkle Twins Introduction and Newspaper Office
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene introduces the Twinkle Twins and their initial briefing on the Burgess murder case in the newspaper office.

narrative_arcs.title: Introduction of Twinkle Twins and their mission
Newspaper Office Briefing on Burgess Murder

sub_scenes.title: Hospital and Police Station Investigation
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene follows Dan and Diane's investigation from the police station to the hospital, revealing Miss Reilly's illness and Tom Reilly's presence.

narrative_arcs.title: Hospital Visit and Discovery of Miss Reilly

sub_scenes.title: Unraveling the Racketeering Plot
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene sees Dan and Diane suspecting racketeering, contacting Elijah, and receiving crucial information from a radio broadcast leading them to Tom Reilly.

narrative_arcs.title: Candy Store Phone Inquiry to Elijah
Radio Broadcast Revelation and Reilly Pursuit
Candy Store Phone Inquiry to Elijah
Radio Broadcast Revelation and Reilly Pursuit

sub_scenes.title: Irish Section Inquiry and Chase
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene covers Dan and Diane's search in the Irish section, their conversation with Mrs. Murphy, the sudden gunfire, and the ensuing chase after Reilly.

narrative_arcs.title: Mrs. Murphy's Explanation of Tom Reilly's Situation

sub_scenes.title: Medical Emergency and Community Support
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene deals with the aftermath of the chase, focusing on Mike's injury, Reilly's need for a blood transfusion, and the community's response to donate blood.

narrative_arcs.title: Hospital Arrival and Blood Transfusion Need
Blood Type Mismatch and Community Aid
Community Responds to Blood Donation Call

sub_scenes.title: Resolution and Celebration
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene concludes the Twinkle Twins' story with Farnacci's arrest and imprisonment, and a celebratory birthday party for Reilly's recovered daughter.

narrative_arcs.title: Demand for Farnacci to Donate Blood and Police Action Plan
Police Confrontation and Arrest of Farnacci
Celebration of Reilly's Daughter's Recovery and Farnacci's Imprisonment

sub_scenes.title: The Jungle Conflict and Dolan's Actions
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene focuses on Devil Dog Dolan's jungle combat, capture, torture, and eventual actions against enemy supplies and natives.

narrative_arcs.title: Dolan Admits and Acts to Burn Supplies
Dolan's Surprise Attack and Fight with Natives
Natives' Homage and Gratitude to Marine

sub_scenes.title: Naval Aftermath and Service Discipline
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene concludes with naval officers discussing Dolan's actions and implementing service discipline.

narrative_arcs.title: Shore Leave Rescinded and Dolan's Praise
